example: Companies that people start to make profit are called private enterprises.
Companies that governments start to give a service are called public enterprises.
Companies with a lot of capital and many workers are called large corporations.

kana: ちゅうしょうきぎょう
example: Companies with less capital and fewer workers are called small to medium-sized companies.
Japan needs startups for the economy to grow.
If a company cannot make a profit, it might go bankrupt.
In the past, some companies polluted the environment.
There are laws to stop pollution and companies must obey them.
